Title: You Again
Overview: History -- make that high school -- may repeat itself when Marni learns that Joanna, the mean girl from her past, is set to be her sister-in-law. Before the wedding bells toll, Marni must show her brother that a tiger doesn't change its stripes. On Marni's side is her mother, while Joanna's backed by her wealthy aunt.
Tagline: What doesn't kill you... is going to marry your brother.
production_companies: Oops Doughnuts Productions, Touchstone Pictures, Frontier Pictures
Cast: Kristen Bell, Sigourney Weaver, Betty White
clean_text: history   high school   repeat marni learn joanna mean girl past set sisterinlaw wedding bell toll marni brother tiger not change stripe marnis mother joannas back wealthy aunt not kill go marry brother comedy romance andy fickman kristen bell sigourney weaver betty white 2010
